text: Cnut cing gret Lyfing arcebiscop & Godwine biscop & ælmær abbot & æþelwine scirman & æþelric & ealle mine þegnas twelfhynde & twihynde freondlice.
& ic cyðe eow þæt se arcebiscop spæc to me ymbe Cristes cyrcean freols þæt heo hæfð nu læsse munde þonne hio hwilan ær hæfde.
Þa lyfde ic him þæt he moste niwne freols settan on minan naman.
Þa cwæð he to me þæt he freolsas genoge hæfde gyf hi aht forstodan.

Þa nam ic me sylf þa freolsas & gelede hi uppan Cristes agen weofod on þæs arcebiscop gewitnysse & on þurkilles eorles & on manegra goddra manna þe me mid wæron to ðan ylcan foreweardan þe hit æþelbyrht cing gefreode & ealle mine foregencgan, þæt næfre nan man ne sy swa dyrsti sy he gehadod sy he læwode þæt ænig þara þinga gelytlie þe on ðam freolse stænt.
Gyf hit hwa þænne do sy his lif her gescert & his wunung on helle grunde butan he hit þe stiðlicor gebete ær his ænde be þæs arcebiscopes tæcincge.
